sources.full: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Lamberto

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The hunter has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hunter makes two Longbow or Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

Tribal warriors live beyond civilization, most often subsisting on fishing and hunting. Each tribe acts in accordance with the wishes of its chief, who is the greatest or oldest warrior of the tribe or a tribe member blessed by the gods.

reaction.name: Spear the Helpless (2/Day)
entries: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the hunter becomes {@condition restrained}, the hunter can make a ranged attack against it.

trait.name: Formation Tactics
entries: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained} while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.
Soldiers are found in many of Ravnica's guilds. The soldier stat block represents a typical member of the rank and file, though weaponry and armor can vary.

reaction.name: Backstab
entries: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the soldier, he can inflict the target the {@condition prone} condition before making a melee spear attack.
